description: Larger member p+4 of cousin primes (p, p+4).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Cousin Primes
mathematica: lst={};Do[p=Prime[n];If[PrimeQ[p4=p+4], (*Print[p4];*)AppendTo[lst, p4]], {n, 10^2}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Aug 21 2008 *)
prog: (PARI) forprime(p=2,1e5,if(isprime(p-4),print1(p", "))) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jul 15 2011(Haskell)a046132 n = a046132_list !! (n-1)a046132_list = filter ((== 1) . a010051') $ map (+ 4) a000040_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 01 2014
crossrefs: Essentially the same as A031505. Cf. A023200, A029710, A098429.
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
